abstract: Adbusters, which lighted the fire that became Occupy Wall Street, is organizing a worldwide protest on Oct. 29 with a goal: a "Robin Hood" tax of 1 percent of all financial transactions.
snippet: Adbusters, which lighted the fire that became Occupy Wall Street, is organizing a worldwide protest on Oct. 29 with a goal: a "Robin Hood" tax of 1 percent of all financial transactions.

headline.main: After Igniting Wall St. Protests, Magazine Proposes One Clear Demand
